post.author: 임기순
post.content:
Hi Joshua: I have the following opportunities available in Toronto, if you know of anyone, please ask them to contact me right away.
Technical Architect - contract & full-time - J2EE & WebSphere IT Project Managers - Full-time - good salary, 2 bonuses, stock options benefits - J2EE & P&C Insurance; Technical Operations support - Senior role - Full-time & Contract - J2EE & WebSphere Programmers - Endeca - Contract & Full-time; Business Systems Analysts - Full-time - no travel - J2EE & P&C insurance; User Interface Developers - Full-time & Contract - jQuery, frontend web development
Thanks Very Much, Debbie Rae INTPS Inc (International Placement Services) 416-640-7466 x 7048
post.title: Various Java/J2EE positions
